heading: HR02318
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE TO RECOMMIT TO THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES HOUSE BILL NO. 8179 OR "AN ACT GRANTING SOLAR PARA SA BAYAN CORPORATION A FRANCHISE TO CONSTRUCT, INSTALL, ESTABLISH, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN DISTRIBUTABLE POWER TECHNOLOGIES AND MINIGRID SYSTEMS THROUGHOUT THE PHILIPPINES TO IMPROVE ACCESS TO SUSTAINABLE ENERGY" AND TO HAVE THE SAME MEASURE BE JOINTLY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES AND THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY
principal-authors: VELASCO, LORD ALLAN JAY Q.; UYBARRETA, CARLOS ROMAN; VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.;
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02318
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE TO RECOMMIT TO THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES HOUSE BILL NO. 8179 OR "AN ACT GRANTING SOLAR PARA SA BAYAN CORPORATION A FRANCHISE TO CONSTRUCT, INSTALL, ESTABLISH, OPERATE AND MAINTAIN DISTRIBUTABLE POWER TECHNOLOGIES AND MINIGRID SYSTEMS THROUGHOUT THE PHILIPPINES TO IMPROVE ACCESS TO SUSTAINABLE ENERGY" AND TO HAVE THE SAME MEASURE BE JOINTLY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE ON LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES AND THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VELASCO, LORD ALLAN JAY Q., UYBARRETA, CARLOS ROMAN, VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.
DATE FILED : 2018-11-21
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2018-11-27
